[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/shops/item_shop_outside.c

This is the default item shop code. An item shop is a shop that only sells specific items. This is the outside version of it.

See also:
/std/shops/inherit/item_shop .c

Written by Pinkfish

Started Wed Oct 14 16:42:21 PDT 1998

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/outside.c and /std/shops/inherit/item_shop.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/move_failures.h, /include/shops/bank.h, /include/armoury.h and /include/money.h
